app.title: Remove Objects - Photo Editor
app.description:
Say bye-bye to passersby or unwanted objects in photos, with the AI pocket app, Remove Objects - AI Retouch!

One tap to remove unwanted objects naturally ‚Äî logo, people, text, blemish, sticker, watermark‚Ä¶ Remove Objects - AI Retouch is your ultimate choice definitely. An unwanted object, no matter how tiny, may completely spoil your photo. But with this super easy & time-saving photo eraser, all photos will be as clean as you expect effortlessly ‚Äî now enhanced with pixel-level cut to ensure perfect edges and seamless blends.

Whether you're a beginner or a pro, AI Retouch is your go-to photo editor. Start your photo retouching journey and get creative with various AI tools!

AI Retouch Features:

‚úèÔ∏è Photo Retouch App  
‚úÖ Remove unwanted objects, watermark, text, caption, logo, stickers‚Ä¶  
‚úÖ Erase background people or even the ex you once took photo with  
‚úÖ Remove skin blemish, acne, pimple to shine the real you  
‚úÖ Delete powerlines, wires or other wirelike objects  
‚úÖ Remove objects like traffic light, trash can, street sign  
‚úÖ Remove whatever you feel is ruining your photos with one touch  
‚úÖ Clean up photos like a pro with simple in-app tutorial

ü™Ñ Creative AI Tools

-   HD Photo Enhancer: Enhance selfies, group shots, and even text for stunning clarity
    
-   AI Remove: Magic Auto mode to detect & remove unwanted objects automatically
    
-   AI Filters: Discover new looks for you, your friends, and pets like never before
    
-   Background Eraser: Auto change background to any color or scene in seconds, with no pixel damage to your subject
    
-   Face Swap: Swap faces with celebrities and film characters‚Äîbe anyone you want
    
-   AI Avatar: Upload your selfies to create eye-catching profile avatars in various styles
    

üåê One-tap Sharing  
Enjoy quick post-to-social! Instantly share your flawless creations to Instagram, Facebook, and more, directly from the app with just a tap.

No need to find another app, AI Retouch is your one-stop photo editor & object remover. Brush over unwanted objects and remove them effectively with one tap. It's like having Pixel Mator-like precision in your pocket ‚Äî but even easier to use!

Plus, with a suite of advanced AI tools at your fingertips, perfecting your photos has never been easier. Get ready to show off your flawless edits to the world!

Now, let Remove Objects - AI Retouch take your photo retouch & object removal experience to the next level. No matter what is spoiling your photo, AI Retouch is always here to help you fix imperfections. And we‚Äôve been committed to making it a better photo editor. So if you have any problems or suggestions, please don‚Äôt hesitate to contact us at  photostudio.feedback@gmail.com

app.summary: One-tap remove objects, logos, text & more with AI Retouch photo editor & eraser

reviews.text: I've already had Background eraser. Tho this app has more functions, such as object remove which is helpful sometimes, that's cool. Unfortunately, a lot of things are not free here. For example, if you wanna special frames, you have to buy a subscription, it's not that cheap, tbh. Tho sometimes you can watch an ad to remove a watermark, for example. At least that's something! :)

OMG!! This is my favorite app for removing anything not wanted n the picture! It leaves the area blending in with what's around it. Even the tiny blemishes, dry skin, etc .. the lasso choice does a Dynamite job!! Lots of beautiful backgrounds to choose from or import your own from your gallery. I've tried many editing apps. This is the only one I've reviewed!! Get it .. you'll be glad you did!

One of the easiest background removers I've found. Need more backgrounds to work with tho.. including plain, solids, patterns, neutrals. Considering subscribing.. very reasonably priced unlike 99% of the apps (not just photo apps but all categories) out there! Keep upgrading your app.. def on the right track. Thank you for an inexpensive, efficient, easy to use and exceptional app.

Review of the Pic Retouch App: I recently had the pleasure of using the Pic Retouch app, and I must say, it exceeded my expectations in every way. This app is an absolute game-changer when it comes to photo editing and retouching. Here's why I believe it deserves a glowing review: First and foremost, the user interface is incredibly intuitive and user-friendly. Even if you're a beginner in photo editing, you'll find it easy to navigate through the app's features and tools. The la

This app is very amazing It erases unwanted and accidentally happened object is very easy way. Simply one of the best apps when it comes to editing, retouching, and removing of photo background and many other things. I got everything I needed it for sweatlessly done without any form of stress, and it's very simple. Therefore, it's recomendable, and I give it 5 stars. It remove object for free by using A.I. magic. It animate your image also some are free but you have to watch ad $ some are paid.
reviews.replyText:
Hi Shrishti Singh (Wow),
So sorry for the ads. We have been doing our best to make it not disturb your editing experience always. And we promise to keep improving it. It is a free app and we really need the ad revenue to feed our team. Hope you can understand. Thanks. üòä

reviews.text: 5 stars for the quality of the object removal function alone. Its not perfect, but it is currently one of the best in the market. The background remover didn't work on my phone.( Bug) The AI Avatar is a gimmick on a high level. For now it seems like a one trick pony app. A bit expensive. Please add more type of professional functions. User interface you can choose from 26 Languages !
reviews.replyText:
Hi Nils Valentin,
So sorry for the inconvenience. You can search for "animation" in your phone's settings to see if any relevant settings have been set to off. If so, you can turn it on and it will work normally. If it doesn't work, feel free to contact us at photostudio.feedback@gmail.com. Best regards! üåπ

reviews.text: I've used another retouch app for several years, this app is surprisingly better. The auto identify feature is great... and the background after removal is very good reconstructing what was behind the image. The background removal tool was extremely good. The only change I'd like to see... remove background, insert new background... to be able to adjust brightness contrast etc to the subject to better match the new background.

I recommend this app over others. I've tried a few apps, this 1 seems to be much better at removing unwanted objects. I am able to zoom in and out of photos while editing. That's handy since phone doesn't hv such a big screen for pictures editing accurately without zoom function. You could always try as many times to complete a photo editing, using trial or by viewing a 30 seconds ads. This means U could try using it before really deciding on buying. 2 thumbs up to the developer.

Fantastic app, one of, if not the best out there, I use the paid version, which isn't expensive at all. I'd like to make a suggestion though, which would put you miles ahead of all the others. When removing the background, would it be possible to make it so you can use a picture of your own for the new background instead of the stock ones. That one feature would make a huge difference, espc as others don't do it, and I'm certain it would also gain you many new customers.

I just installed this because I was wearing a horrible bandaid in one of my photos. I tried YouCam and Samsung standard, but to no avail. The one came through like a charm at a time when I was in a real bind! UPDATE; Well, shoot... I tried removing big red stars. It did nothing at all. Making the interior ever so slightly lighter. But that was all. Google photos worked with that one.

app.AIReview:
Remove Objects - Photo Editor Review

Overview

Remove Objects ‚Äì Photo Editor, boasting over 30 million installs and a robust 4.75 rating, presents itself as an AI-powered solution for quickly removing unwanted elements from photographs. Marketed as a ‚Äúpocket app‚Äù leveraging artificial intelligence, the core functionality revolves around one-tap object removal, targeting common photographic frustrations like logos, people, text, blemishes, stickers, and watermarks. The app operates on a free model, relying on advertising to generate revenue ‚Äì a strategy increasingly prevalent in photography editing tools. This review will delve into its capabilities, usability, and ultimately, whether it delivers on its promises given the substantial user base.

Key Features

The app‚Äôs feature set is centered around several key functionalities:

  • AI-Powered One-Tap Removal: The headline feature ‚Äì a single tap to eliminate selected objects ‚Äì is the primary driver of user engagement. It claims to utilize AI for ‚Äúnatural‚Äù removal, attempting to seamlessly blend the background into the void left by the object.
  • Precision Brush Tool: Beyond the one-tap function, users have access to a brush tool allowing for more granular control over the removal process. This is particularly useful for complex backgrounds or when the AI struggles with precise cuts.
  • Healing Tool: This feature aims to intelligently fill in areas after object removal, further enhancing the natural appearance of the image.
  • Object Selection Modes: The app offers different selection modes ‚Äì rectangle, ellipse, and automatic ‚Äì allowing users to define the area around the object they want to remove.
  • Advanced Editing Tools (Limited): While the core focus is on object removal, the app includes basic editing tools like brightness, contrast, saturation adjustments, and filters for post-removal enhancements.
  • Batch Processing: A surprisingly useful feature allowing users to apply the object removal process to multiple photos simultaneously ‚Äì a significant time saver.

Strengths

  • Ease of Use (One-Tap): The one-tap removal is undeniably quick and effective in many scenarios, particularly with simple backgrounds and clearly defined objects. It‚Äôs genuinely impressive how often this feature produces acceptable results within seconds.
  • High Install Volume: 30 million+ installs demonstrate significant user demand for this type of functionality, suggesting a genuine need or widespread frustration with existing photo editing options. The high rating (4.75888) further reinforces positive user sentiment.
  • Batch Processing Efficiency: The ability to process multiple images at once dramatically increases workflow efficiency for users who regularly edit large quantities of photos. This is a significant differentiator from many competing apps.
  • Responsive Interface: The app's interface feels relatively responsive, with minimal lag when applying edits or navigating between features ‚Äì crucial for a smooth editing experience.

Areas for Improvement

  • AI Accuracy & Complexity: While the one-tap function works well in straightforward cases, it frequently falters on complex backgrounds (detailed foliage, patterned fabrics) or when objects are partially obscured. The "natural" blending isn‚Äôt always convincing, sometimes resulting in noticeable artifacts or a distracting ‚Äúhalo‚Äù effect around removed objects.
  • Brush Tool Limitations: The brush tool, while providing more control, can be difficult to master and often requires significant manual adjustment to achieve truly seamless results. It lacks advanced features like content-aware fill that would genuinely elevate its capabilities.
  • Limited Advanced Editing: The basic editing tools are adequate but lack the depth of features found in professional photo editors. Users seeking extensive color correction or sophisticated adjustments will likely find themselves limited.
  • Advertising Frequency: Given the free model, the app is aggressively monetized with frequent interstitial ads. While not disruptive, they can interrupt the editing flow and potentially detract from the overall user experience.

User Experience

The user interface is clean and relatively intuitive, utilizing a standard mobile photo editor layout ‚Äì a toolbar at the bottom for accessing tools, a preview area displaying the edited image, and an options menu. The initial onboarding process is brief and guides users through the core functionality effectively. However, the learning curve for mastering the brush tool and achieving truly refined results can be steeper. The constant appearance of ads does impact the flow ‚Äì particularly when attempting more complex object removals that require multiple iterations.

Value for Money

As a free app with advertising, Remove Objects ‚Äì Photo Editor offers significant value to casual users who occasionally need quick object removal. The one-tap functionality alone justifies downloading the app for occasional use. However, for serious photographers or those requiring advanced editing capabilities, the limitations of the AI and lack of professional features make it less compelling as a primary photo editor. The in-app purchase option (removing ads) at $2.99 is reasonable considering the core functionality's effectiveness when it works well.

Conclusion

Remove Objects ‚Äì Photo Editor delivers on its core promise: quick and easy object removal, primarily through its innovative one-tap feature. The high install volume and positive rating are testament to its usefulness in addressing a common photographic frustration. However, users should be aware of the limitations of the AI, particularly when dealing with complex backgrounds. While the app isn't a replacement for professional photo editing software, it‚Äôs a valuable tool for everyday users seeking a fast and simple solution for removing unwanted objects from their photos. The batch processing feature and intuitive interface further enhance its appeal. Despite the aggressive advertising strategy, the core functionality remains accessible and effective, making it a worthwhile download for those prioritizing convenience over advanced features.
